title: Façade Manufacturing
description: Facade manufacturing creates custom exterior building systems including curtain walls, cladding panels, and architectural features. This process combines design, engineering, and fabrication to deliver functional and aesthetic building envelopes.

title: Forging
description: Shape metal through controlled deformation to create parts with superior strength and durability. Our forging processes manipulate metal at specific temperatures to achieve optimal grain structure and mechanical properties.

title: CNC Machining
description: CNC machining uses computer-controlled tools to cut and shape materials with high precision. It is ideal for prototypes and production runs with excellent surface finishes.

title: Conventional Machining
description: Traditional machining processes using lathes, mills, and drills operated by skilled machinists. Perfect for custom parts, prototypes, and specialized components that require hands-on expertise.

title: Aluminum Fabrication
description: Aluminum fabrication shapes and joins aluminum through cutting, bending, welding, and finishing processes. This specialized fabrication method creates lightweight, corrosion-resistant components for diverse applications.

title: Tool and Die Making
description: Custom design and fabrication of precision tooling for manufacturing processes. Our tool and die making expertise supports injection molding, stamping, and forming operations with high-quality, durable tooling solutions. Essential for consistent part quality and efficient production across high-volume manufacturing applications.

title: Anodizing and Coating
description: Improve surface properties and aesthetics with specialized finishing processes. Our surface treatment services include anodizing, powder coating, plating, and passivation to enhance corrosion resistance, wear properties, and visual appeal. Essential for extending component life and improving performance in harsh environments.

title: Glass industry
description: The glass industry encompasses manufacturing processes for creating, forming, and finishing glass products for architectural, automotive, and consumer applications. This versatile material is shaped through melting, molding, and precision cutting to create transparent or decorative components.

title: Heat Treatment
description: Enhance material properties through controlled heating and cooling processes. Our heat treatment services include annealing, hardening, tempering, and stress relieving to optimize material performance. Critical for improving component durability, wear resistance, and mechanical properties in demanding applications.

title: Laser Cutting
description: High-precision thermal cutting technology for intricate designs and clean edges. Our laser cutting services offer exceptional accuracy with minimal material distortion. Perfect for detailed cutouts, custom parts, and applications requiring tight tolerances and superior edge quality across various materials.

title: Waterjet Cutting
description: Versatile cold-cutting process using high-pressure water, with or without abrasives. Our waterjet cutting technology can process virtually any material without heat-affected zones or thermal distortion. Ideal for cutting thick materials, heat-sensitive components, and materials that require minimal finishing work.

title: 3D Printing (Additive Manufacturing)
description: Build complex parts layer by layer using a range of materials and technologies. Our additive manufacturing services include SLA, SLS, FDM, and metal printing processes. Perfect for rapid prototyping, custom designs, and producing parts with internal features that would be impossible with traditional manufacturing.

title: Grinding
description: Achieve ultra-smooth surfaces and precise dimensions through controlled abrasion. Our grinding services include surface, cylindrical, and centerless grinding to meet the most demanding finish requirements. Essential for components requiring exceptional surface quality and dimensional accuracy in critical applications.

title: Wire EDM (Electrical Discharge Machining)
description: Create precise cuts in conductive materials using electrical discharges. Our Wire EDM technology offers exceptional accuracy for intricate shapes and delicate parts. Ideal for hard materials, complex geometries, and applications where traditional cutting methods would cause material stress or deformation.

title: Injection Molding
description: High-volume production of consistent plastic parts using precision molds. Our injection molding services deliver repeatable quality for parts with complex geometries and fine details. Cost-effective for medium to high production volumes with a wide range of material options and surface finishes.

title: Stone Manufacturing
description: Stone manufacturing transforms raw stone into finished architectural and decorative elements through cutting, shaping, and finishing processes. This versatile manufacturing method delivers durable, natural products for various construction applications.
